title: Episode 352: Exit The Friend-Zone (Feat. Kali & Boo Sledge)
itunes:title: Episode 352: Exit The Friend-Zone (Feat. Kali & Boo Sledge)
description:
Rapper, Kali joins the ladies of Lip Service alongside rapper/entrepreneur Boo Sledge (of Boo & Gotti) to promote her latest album "Toxic Chocolate." The discussion gets heated quickly when Boo tries to figure out why Kali has her male friend in the friend-zone. Boo tries to explain why plutonic relationships of the opposite sex don't work, while the ladies try giving examples to shut down his theory. Kali even tells a crazy story about how she found out her man was cheating with a woman who hated her...enojy!

Shoutout to Lumi for sponsoring us for this episode! Do you like to micro-dose THC gummies? If so, make sure you go to Microdose.com and use code LIPSERVICE at checkout for 30% off!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
